props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the dialog when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: modal
props.description:
The modality of the dialog When set to true,
interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only dialog content will be visible to screen readers.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the dialog. Can be binded as v-model:open.
